scripts.autoprefixer: postcss -u autoprefixer -r ./*.css && node node_scripts/notify.js 'css compiled' 'And autoprefixed, too'
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer && node node_scripts/appendChildThemeMeta.js ./style.css && npm run upload:css
scripts.upload:css: node node_scripts/uploadFiles.js style.css style.css.map && node node_scripts/notify.js 'css uploaded'
scripts.upload:icons: node node_scripts/uploadFiles.js img/icons/communications.svg img/icons/consulting.svg img/icons/content.svg img/icons/seo.svg img/icons/website.svg img/icons/writing.svg img/icons/quotation.svg
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:functions' 'npm run watch:icons'
